rows.label: qst201902_msg0001
rows.name:
The black-feathered fool's shop
should be right here... Hmm?

rows.label: qst201902_msg0002
rows.name:
What's wrong? They seem
to be in trouble...

rows.label: qst201902_msg0003
rows.name:
Indeed... Let us ask them
what is the matter.

rows.label: qst201902_msg0004
rows.name:
What is it? Why do you
look so troubled?

rows.label: qst201902_msg0005
rows.name: Did something happen?

rows.label: qst201902_msg0006
rows.name:
Yes... I was trying to get
back the money I gave to
the Nopon at this shop...

rows.label: qst201902_msg0007
rows.name:
You too are a victim of the black-feathered
fool? Tell us the details.

rows.label: qst201902_msg0008
rows.name: Yes...

rows.label: qst201902_msg0009
rows.name:
Actually, a Nopon merchant here
named Suisui offered me a good
deal to turn 1,000G into 10,000G.

rows.label: qst201902_msg0010
rows.name:
He said it was easy and would
only take a few days, and asked
if I wanted to do it...

rows.label: qst201902_msg0011
rows.name:
I gave him the money, but
it was never returned...

rows.label: qst201902_msg0012
rows.name:
I thought something was
wrong and came to the shop,
but no one was here.

rows.label: qst201902_msg0013
rows.name:
I asked the neighbors, and
they said Suisui closed the
shop a few days ago...

rows.label: qst201902_msg0014
rows.name: So now I don't know what to do...

rows.label: qst201902_msg0015
rows.name:
I can't even buy food for my
daughter. What are we going to do...

rows.label: qst201902_msg0016
rows.name:
So he tricked them, took
the money, and ran...

rows.label: qst201902_msg0017
rows.name: That black-feathered fool!

rows.label: qst201902_msg0018
rows.name:
Not content with deceiving
us, he now deceives an
innocent mother and child...

rows.label: qst201902_msg0019
rows.name:
Such an act... even if the
gods forgive it, we will not!

rows.label: qst201902_msg0020
rows.name: Rex! Give this mother 10,000G!

rows.label: qst201902_msg0021
rows.name: Huh?

rows.label: qst201902_msg0022
rows.name: Why me?!

rows.label: qst201902_msg0023
rows.name: Why are you so surprised?

rows.label: qst201902_msg0024
rows.name:
We are going to catch that
fool and get back our one
million gold anyway.

rows.label: qst201902_msg0025
rows.name:
So there should be no problem in
advancing the money, should there?

rows.label: qst201902_msg0026
rows.name:
But still, 10,000G is a bit steep...
Wouldn't 1,000G be enough?

rows.label: qst201902_msg0027
rows.name:
Fool! If you are a man,
show some spirit!
